artist: Engraver: Jacob Houbraken; Painter: After Heindrik Pothoven
inscription:
Signature, Title, and Inscription

on oval in image in black: [ In Beiden Uittemunten Is Zeldzaam]; below image in black: [JOHAN VAN DER DOES/ six lines in Dutch: Heer Van Noortwyk ....Van den Degen/ by J. Francq Van Berkley/ H. Pothoven del.  Na het Origineel, op S.Lands Bibliotheek. te Leyden. J Houbraken sculpsit 1775]
life_date: Jacob Houbraken, Engraver, Dutch, 1698–1780; After Heindrik Pothoven, Painter, Dutch, 1725–1795
title: Portrait of Johan Van Der Does
